segments.label: prefix
segments.content: Complication-free IV bolus application of Imeron 400, followed by multi-slice Spiral CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis in venous contrast phase. Additional oral contrast (with Micropaque 1:7 in water, with Gastrolux 1:33 in water). Dual-energy reconstructions for Duodenal layer and coronal and sagittal secondary reconstructions. Additional medication: Prednisolon on station known for contrast medium reaction.

segments.label: Lungs
segments.content: Unremarkable presentation of the basal lung segments.

segments.label: Lungs
segments.content: No suspicious round intrapulmonary nodules.

segments.label: Lungs
segments.content: No active infiltrates.

segments.label: Pleura
segments.content: No pleural effusion.

segments.label: Heart
segments.content: Central positioning of the cardiomedias-tinum.

segments.label: Heart
segments.content: No pericardial effusion.

segments.label: Liver
segments.content: Liver parenchyma evenly contrasted without evidence of densely differentiated focal lesions.

segments.label: Liver
segments.content: Liver veins and portal vein freely perfused.

segments.label: Liver
segments.content: No intra- or extrahepatic cholestasis.

segments.label: Gallbladder
segments.content: Gallbladder filled and irritationless.

segments.label: Adrenals
segments.content: Both adrenals normal.

segments.label: Pancreas/Spleen
segments.content: Unremarkable presentation of pancreas and spleen.

segments.label: Kidneys
segments.content: Symmetrical contrast of renal parenchyma.

segments.label: Kidneys
segments.content: No hydronephrosis.

segments.label: Bladder
segments.content: Unremarkable presentation of the urinary bladder.

segments.label: Bowel
segments.content: Normal passage of orally applied contrast agent to the left colon flexure.

segments.label: Bowel
segments.content: No indication of intestinal passage obstruction.

segments.label: Appendix
segments.content: Irritationless presentation of the appendix.

segments.label: Abdomen
segments.content: No evidence of free fluid or free intra-abdominal air.

segments.label: Uterus
segments.content: Calcified uterus myoma.

segments.label: Lymph Nodes
segments.content: No evidence of inguinal lymphadenopathy below the diaphragm.

segments.label: Spine
segments.content: Minimal degenerative changes to the spine.

segments.label: Bones
segments.content: No evidence of suspicious osseous lesions.

Liver parenchyma evenly contrasted without evidence of densely differentiated focal lesions.

Complication-free IV bolus application of Imeron 400, followed by multi-slice Spiral CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis in venous contrast phase. Additional oral contrast (with Micropaque 1:7 in water, with Gastrolux 1:33 in water). Dual-energy reconstructions for Duodenal layer and coronal and sagittal secondary reconstructions. Additional medication: Prednisolon on station known for contrast medium reaction.

Ss9Z66yVeu8_1.text:
Complication-free IV bolus application of Imeron 400, followed by multi-slice Spiral CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis in venous contrast phase. Additional oral contrast (with Micropaque 1:7 in water, with Gastrolux 1:33 in water). Dual-energy reconstructions for Duodenal layer and coronal and sagittal secondary reconstructions. Additional medication: Prednisolon on station known for contrast medium reaction.

FINDINGS:

Lungs: Unremarkable presentation of the basal lung segments. No suspicious round intrapulmonary nodules. No active infiltrates.

Pleura: No pleural effusion.

Heart: Central positioning of the cardiomedias-tinum. No pericardial effusion.

Liver: Liver parenchyma evenly contrasted without evidence of densely differentiated focal lesions. Liver veins and portal vein freely perfused. No intra- or extrahepatic cholestasis.

Gallbladder: Gallbladder filled and irritationless.

Adrenals: Both adrenals normal.

Pancreas/Spleen: Unremarkable presentation of pancreas and spleen.

Kidneys: Symmetrical contrast of renal parenchyma. No hydronephrosis.

Bladder: Unremarkable presentation of the urinary bladder.

Bowel: Normal passage of orally applied contrast agent to the left colon flexure. No indication of intestinal passage obstruction.

Appendix: Irritationless presentation of the appendix.

Abdomen: No evidence of free fluid or free intra-abdominal air.

Uterus: Calcified uterus myoma.

Lymph Nodes: No evidence of inguinal lymphadenopathy below the diaphragm.

Spine: Minimal degenerative changes to the spine.

Bones: No evidence of suspicious osseous lesions.

segments.label: body
segments.content: Continuous multi-slice Spiral-CT in native axial stacking.

segments.label: body
segments.content: Thin slice reconstructions.

segments.label: body
segments.content: Assessed is the spine from D11 to lumbosacral junction.

segments.label: Bones
segments.content: Osteoporotic bone aspect, older suggesting.

segments.label: Bones
segments.content: Ground and surface plates impression at D12, mostly osteoporotic (Genant 2) without clear marginal involvement.

segments.label: Lumbar Spine
segments.content: Additionally, advanced degenerative changes in LWS, maximum point in segment L3-L1.

segments.label: Lumbar Spine
segments.content: Minimal pseudoretrolisthesis of D1 from 2 and D2 from 3 approximately 5 mm without associated spondylolysis.

segments.label: Lumbar Spine
segments.content: Consecutive mild grade neuroforaminal bony narrowing of right L1 and 2 and left L2 neuroforamen.

segments.label: Lumbar Spine
segments.content: No high-grade spinal or neuroforaminal bony narrowing.

segments.label: Pleura
segments.content: Mild pleural effusion on the left side.

segments.label: Lungs
segments.content: Pulmonary venous congestion signs.

segments.label: Kidneys
segments.content: Multiple renal cysts bilaterally, partially with calcified portions in the upper pole bilaterally.

segments.label: Kidneys
segments.content: Perirenal stranding.

segments.label: Gallbladder
segments.content: Silent cholelithiasis.

segments.label: Aorta
segments.content: Elongation and sclerosis of abdominal aorta with moderate stenosis of celiac trunk and high-grade stenosis of mesenteric artery at calcified plaques.

segments.label: Pelvis
segments.content: Calcification also of the pelvic axis bilaterally.

Thin slice reconstructions.

Ground and surface plates impression at D12, mostly osteoporotic (Genant 2) without clear marginal involvement.

DJJ9wVjkyJU_1.text:
FINDINGS:

body: Continuous multi-slice Spiral-CT in native axial stacking. Thin slice reconstructions. Assessed is the spine from D11 to lumbosacral junction.

Bones: Osteoporotic bone aspect, older suggesting. Ground and surface plates impression at D12, mostly osteoporotic (Genant 2) without clear marginal involvement.

Lumbar Spine: Additionally, advanced degenerative changes in LWS, maximum point in segment L3-L1. Minimal pseudoretrolisthesis of D1 from 2 and D2 from 3 approximately 5 mm without associated spondylolysis. Consecutive mild grade neuroforaminal bony narrowing of right L1 and 2 and left L2 neuroforamen. No high-grade spinal or neuroforaminal bony narrowing.

Pleura: Mild pleural effusion on the left side.

Lungs: Pulmonary venous congestion signs.

Kidneys: Multiple renal cysts bilaterally, partially with calcified portions in the upper pole bilaterally. Perirenal stranding.

Gallbladder: Silent cholelithiasis.

Aorta: Elongation and sclerosis of abdominal aorta with moderate stenosis of celiac trunk and high-grade stenosis of mesenteric artery at calcified plaques.

Pelvis: Calcification also of the pelvic axis bilaterally.

segments.label: body
segments.content: Large sellar mass lesion with convexity in the left atrium of the ventricle, known from MRT-VU on 15.12.23.

segments.label: body
segments.content: With dilated internal ventricular chambers, there is a hydrocephalus (ventriculomegaly).

segments.label: body
segments.content: Distally, the anterior cerebral arteries are displaced laterally up to the M1 segment of the middle cerebral artery on both sides, but overall well-contrasted.

segments.label: body
segments.content: Contrast of the arterial vessels in the anterior and posterior circulation areas is uniform without high-grade stenoses or disruptions.

segments.label: body
segments.content: No aneurysms were found.

extractions.extraction_text: Large sellar mass lesion with convexity in the left atrium of the ventricle, known from MRT-VU on 15.12.23.
With dilated internal ventricular chambers, there is a hydrocephalus (ventriculomegaly).
Distally, the anterior cerebral arteries are displaced laterally up to the M1 segment of the middle cerebral artery on both sides, but overall well-contrasted.
Contrast of the arterial vessels in the anterior and posterior circulation areas is uniform without high-grade stenoses or disruptions.
No aneurysms were found.

pPq5uIsBEoo_1.text:
FINDINGS:

body: Large sellar mass lesion with convexity in the left atrium of the ventricle, known from MRT-VU on 15.12.23. With dilated internal ventricular chambers, there is a hydrocephalus (ventriculomegaly). Distally, the anterior cerebral arteries are displaced laterally up to the M1 segment of the middle cerebral artery on both sides, but overall well-contrasted. Contrast of the arterial vessels in the anterior and posterior circulation areas is uniform without high-grade stenoses or disruptions. No aneurysms were found.

segments.label: Technique
segments.content: Cross-sectional Spiral CT through Thorax, Abdomen, Pelvis in venous contrast phase and excretion phase post i.v. application of Imeron 400 with oral contrast. Thin-slice reconstructions and secondary coronary and sagittal reconstructions.

segments.label: Neck
segments.content: Unremarkable visualization of the enfolded neck structures, particularly the thyroid.

segments.label: Heart
segments.content: Mediastinal positioning of the heart.

segments.label: Heart
segments.content: With regard to coronary stenting. Normally enhanced contrast of the cardiac chambers and central vessels.

segments.label: Heart
segments.content: No pericardial effusion.

segments.label: Lymph Nodes
segments.content: Unchanged representation of mediastinal lymph nodes without pathologically enlarged examples.

segments.label: Lymph Nodes
segments.content: Also, consistently sized lymph nodes between the left main bronchus and pulmonary artery with tracer enhancement in the initial investigation (PET CT on 10/23).

segments.label: Lymph Nodes
segments.content: No pathologically enlarged hilar or axillary lymph nodes bilaterally.

extractions.extraction_text: Cross-sectional Spiral CT through Thorax, Abdomen, Pelvis in venous contrast phase and excretion phase post i.v. application of Imeron 400 with oral contrast. Thin-slice reconstructions and secondary coronary and sagittal reconstructions.
Unremarkable visualization of the enfolded neck structures, particularly the thyroid.
Mediastinal positioning of the heart.
With regard to coronary stenting. Normally enhanced contrast of the cardiac chambers and central vessels.
No pericardial effusion.
Unchanged representation of mediastinal lymph nodes without pathologically enlarged examples.
Also, consistently sized lymph nodes between the left main bronchus and pulmonary artery with tracer enhancement in the initial investigation (PET CT on 10/23).
No pathologically enlarged hilar or axillary lymph nodes bilaterally.

pgrUFnHSHaE_1.text:
Cross-sectional Spiral CT through Thorax, Abdomen, Pelvis in venous contrast phase and excretion phase post i.v. application of Imeron 400 with oral contrast. Thin-slice reconstructions and secondary coronary and sagittal reconstructions.


FINDINGS:

Neck: Unremarkable visualization of the enfolded neck structures, particularly the thyroid.

Heart: Mediastinal positioning of the heart. With regard to coronary stenting. Normally enhanced contrast of the cardiac chambers and central vessels. No pericardial effusion.

Lymph Nodes: Unchanged representation of mediastinal lymph nodes without pathologically enlarged examples. Also, consistently sized lymph nodes between the left main bronchus and pulmonary artery with tracer enhancement in the initial investigation (PET CT on 10/23). No pathologically enlarged hilar or axillary lymph nodes bilaterally.

segments.label: body
segments.content: Continuous axial layer scanning through the LWS using multi-slice spiral technique natively.

segments.label: body
segments.content: Dynagram reconstructions in coronal and sagittal planes.

segments.label: body
segments.content: If not known, sonographic correlation recommended.

segments.label: Lumbar Spine Levels: L4-L5
segments.content: Arrosion of the base plate LWK 4 and the cover plate LWK 5 with adjacent multisclerosis of the vertebral body.

segments.label: Lumbar Spine Levels: L4-L5
segments.content: No evidence of recent fracture.

segments.label: Lumbar Spine
segments.content: Correct posterior border alignment and position within the facet joints.

segments.label: Kidneys
segments.content: Renal lesions on both sides with partially cystic density values, differential diagnosis renal cysts.

If not known, sonographic correlation recommended.

Lumbar Spine Levels: L4-L5: Arrosion of the base plate LWK 4 and the cover plate LWK 5 with adjacent multisclerosis of the vertebral body. No evidence of recent fracture.
